A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"The Last Jedi\" was an entertaining piece of garbage.  It wasn't a particularly well-made film\, let alone a Star Wars film (actually\, the Phantom Menace is better) with gaping plot holes\, pointless side quests\, ill-timed campy humor\, and characters betraying their well-understood traits.  This basically wan't a Star Wars movie\, since the last Jedi himself basically said the Dark and Light side of the force doesn't matter.  So much for a 40-year legacy.
